named-query.name: BC_READ_ACTIVE_CUSTOMER_ADDRESSES_BY_CUSTOMER_ID
named-query.query: SELECT ca FROM org.broadleafcommerce.profile.domain.CustomerAddress ca WHERE ca.customer.id = :customerId AND ca.address.isActive = TRUE ORDER BY ca.id

named-query.name: BC_READ_CUSTOMER_ADDRESS_BY_ID_AND_CUSTOMER_ID
named-query.query: SELECT ca FROM org.broadleafcommerce.profile.domain.CustomerAddress ca WHERE ca.customer.id = :customerId AND ca.id = :customerAddressId

named-query.name: BC_FIND_DEFAULT_ADDRESS_BY_CUSTOMER_ID
named-query.query: SELECT ca FROM org.broadleafcommerce.profile.domain.CustomerAddress ca WHERE ca.customer.id = :customerId AND ca.address.isDefault = TRUE
